comments: Washington (CHA) moves into Butler's (MIA) path and initiates body contact that affects his SQBR.
Adebayo (MIA) blocks the shot attempt by Ball (CHA) after it reaches its apex and is on its downward flight towards the basket.
Butler (MIA) gathers the ball and take more than a step before starting his dribble.
Bridges (CHA) legally contests Butler's (MIA) shot attempt at the basket.
Butler (MIA) initially gets his hand on the ball, but then makes contact to Bridges' (CHA) arm that affects his shot attempt at the rim.
Tucker (MIA) absorbs the body contact from Harrell (CHA) but his arms are not in a vertical position when he makes contact to Harrell's arms and the contact affects his shot attempt.
Ball (CHA) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Ball (CHA) cleanly dislodges the ball from Butler (MIA) during his drive to the basket.
Tucker (MIA) is established in a legal guarding position in Bridges' (CHA) path and Bridges extends his off-arm into him and dislodges him from his defensive position.
Bridges (CHA) steps into Lowry's (MIA) path and initiates body contact that affects his SQBR.
Bridges (CHA) legally contests Butler's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Adebayo (MIA) and Harrell (CHA) both jump for the rebound and incidental contact occurs.  The game clock expires as both players have their hands on the ball.

Lowry (MIA) makes a field goal at the 2:03 mark from inside of the three-point line that is ruled a three-point field goal. Since play did not stop before the two-minute mark, the replay center could not correct the error.
Washington (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Robinson (MIA) and gives him room to avoid the marginal contact.
Lowry (MIA) maintains his pivot foot.
Bridges (CHA) jumps vertically and absorbs the contact from Lowry (MIA) during his shot attempt at the basket.
Rozier (CHA) establishes himself in a screening position in the path of Butler (MIA) and leans into him, but the contact is marginal.
Butler (MIA) avoids making contact with Ball (CHA) during the jump shot attempt.
Tucker (MIA) legally contests Washington's (CHA) driving shot attempt.
Tucker (MIA) places his hands on Washington (CHA) as he sets the screen but the contact is marginal.
Ball (CHA) makes marginal contact with Lowry (MIA), who then steps out of bounds.
Tucker (MIA) reaches in and makes contact to Harrell's (CHA) arm that affects his shot attempt.
Washington (CHA) legally contests Butler's (MIA) jump shot attempt.  Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) reaches back and briefly places an arm around Tucker (MIA) during the rebound but the contact is marginal.
Butler (MIA) legally contests Bridges' (CHA) jump shot attempt and makes clean contact with the ball.
Tucker (MIA) cleanly steals the inbounds pass and any contact with Harrell (CHA) is incidental.
Lowry (MIA) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Adebayo (MIA) makes contact to Bridges' (CHA) arm that affects his shot attempt at the rim.
Robinson (MIA) legally contests Bridges' (CHA) jump shot attempt.  Any "high-five" contact after the release is considered incidental.
Adebayo (MIA) legally contests Oubre Jr.'s (CHA) jump shot attempt and cleanly blocks it.
Rozier (CHA) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
Oubre Jr. (CHA) commits a take foul on Butler (MIA).
Rozier (CHA) commits a take foul on Robinson (MIA).
